data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: To summarize, as noted in Anand's article (1993), we can view the relationship between human development and economic development in three different explanations. First, increase ____ average ____ leading ____ improvement ____ health ____ nutrition ( known ____ Capability Expansion through Economic Growth ). Second, it ____ believed ____ social ____ can ____ be ____ by ____ income ____ ( ____ as Capability Expansion ____ Poverty Reduction ). Thirdly, (known as Capability Expansion through Social Services), defines the improvement of social outcomes with essential services such as education, health care, and clean drinking water.
data.partBlankContent: To summarize, as noted in Anand's article (1993), we can view the relationship between human development and economic development in three different explanations. First, increase i_ average inc___ leading t_ improvement i_ health a__ nutrition ( known a_ Capability Expansion through Economic Growth ). Second, it i_ believed th__ social outc____ can on__ be impr____ by redu____ income pov____ ( kn___ as Capability Expansion thr____ Poverty Reduction ). Thirdly, (known as Capability Expansion through Social Services), defines the improvement of social outcomes with essential services such as education, health care, and clean drinking water.
data.fullContent: To summarize, as noted in Anand's article (1993), we can view the relationship between human development and economic development in three different explanations. First, increase in average income leading to improvement in health and nutrition ( known as Capability Expansion through Economic Growth ). Second, it is believed that social outcomes can only be improved by reducing income poverty ( known as Capability Expansion through Poverty Reduction ). Thirdly, (known as Capability Expansion through Social Services), defines the improvement of social outcomes with essential services such as education, health care, and clean drinking water.
data.answer: 总之，正如阿南德的文章(1993)所指出的，我们可以从三种不同的解释来看待人类发展和经济发展之间的关系。首先，平均收入的增加导致健康和营养状况的改善(即通过经济增长提高能力)。第二，人们认为只有通过减少收入贫困(即通过减少贫困扩大能力)才能改善社会成果。第三，(称为通过社会服务的能力扩展)，定义了通过教育、卫生保健和清洁饮用水等基本服务来改善社会结果。
